overview: Basketball star Dennis Rodman teams with Hollywood Hogan to face Lex Luger & The Giant. "Rowdy" Roddy Piper faces Ric Flair. Scott Hall joins forces with "Macho Man" Randy Savage to battle "Diamond" Dallas Page & Curt Hennig. Chris Jericho faces Ultimo Dragon and more!
tagline: If You Don't Like It, Bite Me!
title: WCW Bash at The Beach 1997
